docs.text: a standoff .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a man holds a woman , a diplomat's daughter , hostage in his embrace , a gun pressed to her head .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a cop , impaired by drink due to his wife's philandering , trains his gun on the man's nether regions , threatening to shoot .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: another cop holds his gun to his partner's temple , forcing him to disarm .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the scene unfolds like a foursome bidding in bridge--upping the ante , signaling tacitly , going for game .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the second cop retrieves the first cop's weapon , the suspect lowers his , and the woman caught in the middle moves--in slow motion--to safety .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is then that the intoxicated officer makes his move , grabbing for the assailant's gun .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the room turns upside down , a shot rings out , a cop is down .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: shot in the back and paralyzed for life .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the young man who found himself in the wrong place at the wrong time is sent to prison for six years for a crime he didn't commit .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: storytelling has always been one of pedro almod ? var's greatest gifts and in " live flesh " he gives us a twisting , turning , compelling tale peppered with well-written , colorful characters .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: characters who find themselves , more often than not , in carefully-constructed scenes like these .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: characters played by actors we might not know , but who look strikingly familiar nevertheless .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: take the ruggedly handsome victor plaza ( liberto rabal ) , for instance .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: before he gets out of prison he could easily be mistaken for that almod ? var favorite , antonio banderas .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: when we first meet elena ( francesca neri ) , the woman in the middle of the nervous shakedown , she looks like spice girl barbie with her frizzy shock of orange hair , but later tones down her look sufficiently to pass for juliette lewis .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: elena's husband david ( javier bardem ) is the cop crippled in the shooting and he wears david schwimmer's bemused expression throughout .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: playing the inebriated cop and his cheating wife are jos ? sancho and angela molina--no lookalikes spring to mind , but they round out the excellent cast .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's a credit to almod ? var's craft that these five individuals cross paths and intertwine with such credulity .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: " live flesh " begins and ends with a live birth and the film's contradictions come almost as often as the contractions .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: between the two childbearings , coincidence , irony , and a hefty dollop of sex form the key elements of this thoroughly entertaining film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: although based on a ruth rendell story , " live flesh " is brimming with the acclaimed spanish director's high-heeled flourishes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: women are at times alluring and repulsive , their extravagant hairdos and animal print coats providing colorful highlights to the intricately-woven drama , an eye bruised by an abusive husband here , a mouth bloodied by an impromptu delivery there .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: while in prison , victor learns bulgarian from an inmate and learns to love the bible , quoting from deuteronomy thereafter not unlike the way by which david and sancho refer to themselves as " guardians of a sick flock . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: victor's pre-fab inheritance is a shambles in a slum resembling sarajevo .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: " dear son , i got cancer " his mother writes to him in jail .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she dies before he is released and it's at the cemetery that victor is reacquainted with elena--redemption , ultimately , substituting for revenge .
docs.label: positive
